alert.note: Alert for South Laramie Range; South Laramie Range Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 25 at 1:52PM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...LIGHT SNOW AND GUSTY WEST WINDS CREATING BLOWING SNOW OVER THE INTERSTATE 80 SUMMIT THROUGH 6 PM THIS EVENING... Periodic light to briefly moderate snowfall is expected across the Interstate 80 Summit between Cheyenne and Laramie through 6 PM today. Latest WYDOT webcams showing poor visibility at Lone Tree and Vedauwoo...or mile markers 330 to 333. Expect periods of poor visibility below one half mile at times in blowing snow. Winds will be gusting from the west of 35 to 40 mph at times through 6 PM this evening. If encountering these conditions...slow down and allow extra distance between you and the vehicle in front of you.

area.areaDesc: South Laramie Range; South Laramie Range Foothills
